data.title: The Beatles Story
data.meta_description: Tickets must be pre-purchased in advance of your visit. To purchase tickets on the day, please speak to a member of our staff on arrival and you will be allocated the next available timeslot, subject to availability. To book tickets please visit their website.  The award-winning ‘The Beatles Story’ is the world's largest permanent exhibition purely devoted to telling the story of The Beatles’ rise to fame. Located in the Fab Four’s hometown of Liverpool on the stunning Royal Albert Dock, The Beatles Story is Liverpool’s leading Beatles’ attraction taking visitors on a unique immersive journey through the lives, times, culture and music of the world’s greatest band. Find out more about Liverpool’s famous sons by joining The Beatles on their journey; first conquering Liverpool, and then the world, through recreations of key locations from the band’s career including The Casbah Club, The Cavern Club, and Abbey Road Studios. Multi-media audio guides are available in twelve different languages including English, French, German, Italian, Japanese, Mandarin, Polish, Russian, Spanish, Brazilian Portuguese, Korean and Cantonese. Beautifully narrated by John Lennon’s sister, Julia, the FREE guide is packed with information, imagery, and features video interviews with Paul McCartney and Ringo Starr, giving visitors a fascinating insight into the story of the Fab Four. A must for any music fan, The Beatles Story features an impressive collection of memorabilia including the band’s original instruments, John Lennon’s New York piano, Ringo Starr’s drum kit, rare album sleeves, photography and original hand-written lyrics. The award-winning attraction celebrated its 30 th  anniversary in 2020 and visitors can see newly introduced items and exhibits including a display to celebrate Ringo’s 80 th  birthday, new immersive experiences in the replica Cavern Club room and John Lennon’s White Room and exciting new memorabilia. Finish your perfect historical experience in one of two Beatles-themed Fab4 Cafes or browse through a fantastic range of gifts available from one of the Fab4 Stores. Accessibility Information  The main entrance has level access with a lift. There is also level access from the main entrance to the main exhibition area. A hearing loop is in place in the Welcome Centre, the Main Exhibition , the Discovery Zone, the Fab4 Cafe and the Fab4 Store. For more information please visit their website. Coach Driver Benefit  The Beatles Story offers coach drivers free entrance for any group booking with a minimum of 10 adults. T&Cs: • This offer is non-refundable and non-transferable, cannot be resold, and no cash alternative will be offered. • The Beatles Story reserves the right to refuse entry at any time. The Beatles Story information
